name: WP Landing Page
author: B5 Productions

sections.description:
Easily Create Converting Landing Pages in WordPress With WP Landing Page

  • Choose between beautiful templates
  • Edition on front end
  • Build & publish landing pages with no code or development skills
  • Insert Shortcodes
sections.installation:
To install WP Landing Page plugin to do :

  1. Click here to download plugin
  2. Go to your WP site’s plugin page on your Dashboard and select “add plugin” on the top left. Then click on “Upload” again on the top left
  3. Select the file and press “Install”. Installation may take up to 30-45 seconds.
  4. Finally, activate the plugin and you are ready to go!
sections.faq:
How to change the text in my landing page

Simply, double click of your text will popup a modal

How to change colors of my landing page

Edit your landing page via the button edit in administation top bar, in the block “colors” you can choose your colors via color picker.
